reviewtext: Even with 200 ISO film (the manual recommends ISO 400), this camera takes very sharp indoor/outdoor pictures with brilliant colors. Haven't tried the 400 film yet, so I'm eager to try some outdoor evening pictures. However, with the 200 film, this camera still took some excellent night pictures (using a tripod) of downtown during Christmas season. Don't regret buying it one bit, best investment in a long time.
summary: Terrific pictures, very sharp and colorful.
